reviewtext: Sony MDR-V6 headphones are by far the best headphones out there for the money. I listened to Audio Technica and Dr.Dre's Beats headphones and In my opinion the Sony cans sound the best. The Dynamic range is Great. Good Bass, Clarity at the same time. I use mine with "cMoy Headphone Amplifier" and it shines truly with it. I am using it from last 12 yrs and I enjoyed it all these years. I am happy to see Sony still makes them. I will definitely order one more headphones for my family members.Pros:Excellent sound stage, Great Highs and Lows. Amazing.Very Comfortable HeadphonesExcellent Build quality, Very sturdy using excellent materialsHeadphone coil is protected by Metal shieldSpring type wire - very usefulFrequency range of headphones is comparable or better than much high end expensive headphonesNo Distortions, No Loose connection problems, No Rust after using for 12 yrs (Replaced ear pads 3 timesin 12 yrs)Love the Matte Black finish on the headphonesCons:None Noticed
